abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Brazil", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", { "or" : [ "TaxonKey is Acanthella Hook.fil.", "TaxonKey is Aciotis D.Don", "TaxonKey is Acisanthera P.Browne", "TaxonKey is Dicrananthera C.Presl", "TaxonKey is Dicrananthera K.B.Presl, 1832", "TaxonKey is Noterophila Mart.", "TaxonKey is Rostranthera M.J.Rocha & P.J.F.Guim.", "TaxonKey is Appendicularia DC.", "TaxonKey is Comolia DC.", "TaxonKey is Leiostegia Benth.", "TaxonKey is Ernestia DC.", "TaxonKey is Fritzschia Cham.", "TaxonKey is Macairea DC.", "TaxonKey is Marcetia DC.", "TaxonKey is Nepsera Naudin", "TaxonKey is Pseudoernestia (Cogn.) Krasser", "TaxonKey is Sandemania Gleason", "TaxonKey is Siphanthera Pohl", "TaxonKey is Siphanthera Pohl ex DC.", "TaxonKey is Comoliopsis Wurdack", "TaxonKey is Brasilianthus Almeda & Michelang." ] } ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Herbarium (UNA) 1 records from MEXU/Tipos de plantas vasculares 1 records from Kathryn Kalmbach Herbarium 1 records from RSA - California Botanic Garden Herbarium 1 records from Herbario Amazónico Colombiano 1 records from HVAT - Herbário do Vale do Taquari 1 records from Museu Paraense Emilio Goeldi - Xiloteca Collection 1 records from Botany (UPS) 1 records from CEPEC herbarium - Centro de Pesquisas do Cacau - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 1 records from SPFw - Xiloteca do Instituto de Biociências da Universidade de São Paulo 1 records from DVPR - Herbário da Universidade Tecnológica Federal do Paraná - Dois Vizinhos 1 records from UTEP Plants (Arctos) 1 records from SANT Herbarium vascular plants collection 1 records from Plant Specimen Database of Tama Forest Science Garden, Forestry and Forest Products Research Institute, Japan 1 records from CONN 1 records from LUSC - Herbário de Lages da Universidade do Estado de Santa Catarina 1 records from Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales "Bernardino Rivadavia" (MACN). Vascular Plants National Collection (BAv) 1 records from North Carolina State University Vascular Plant Herbarium 1 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 1 records from Intermountain Herbarium (Vascular plants & algae) 2 records from Colección de plantas vasculares del herbario de la Universitat de València (VAL) 2 records from P herbarium - Muséum national d’histoire naturelle, Paris - Amostras Brasileiras Repatriadas - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 2 records from HUCPE - Herbário da Universidade Católica de Pernambuco 2 records from The Vascular Plants Collection of the University of Goettingen 2 records from Type herbarium, Göttingen (GOET) 2 records from MPUC - Herbário do Museu da Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul 2 records from IRAI - Herbário do Parque da Ciência Newton Freire Maia 2 records from Vascular Plant Herbarium, Oslo (O) UiO 2 records from MOSS - Herbário Dárdano de Andrade Lima 2 records from HUEFS herbarium - Universidade Estadual de Feira de Santana - Herbário Virtual REFLORA 3 records from Herbarium Berolinense, Berlin (B) 3 records from HAMAB - Herbário Amapaense 4 records from Colección de plantas vasculares de Brasil del Herbario "Jaime Andrés Rodríguez".
